content: this **tiny toadstool** is a **bonus free pattern** to get us in the crafty festive mood while we wait for the next instalment of the amigurumi advent to begin this little mushroom is really quick to make and will look great filling a small gap on the christmas tree or as a cute addition to a gift tag make a whole bunch of them in different colours and string them up into a garland the pattern is written in us crochet terms with step-by-step images to guide you along the way the project can be made with your preferred yarn the sample was made in dk-weight cotton with 3 0mm hook find out more about our upcoming mcal in our ravelry group https //www ravelry com/groups/amigurumi-adventures-2
